description: This is dashboard for monitoring Prusa Buddy based 3D printers that expose metrics via Syslog with use of pubeldev/prusa_exporter

targets.expr: (sum(prusa_current{mac="$printer_mac", device!~"bedlet.*", rail!="5V"}) * max (prusa_voltage{mac="$printer_mac", rail="24V"}) + (sum(prusa_current{mac="$printer_mac", rail="5V"}) * max(prusa_voltage{mac="$printer_mac", rail="5V"}))) / 1000

(sum(prusa_current{mac="$printer_mac", device!~"bedlet.*", rail!="5V"}) * max (prusa_voltage{mac="$printer_mac", rail="24V"}) + (sum(prusa_current{mac="$printer_mac", rail="5V"}) * max(prusa_voltage{mac="$printer_mac", rail="5V"}))) / 1000

panels.description: Total Count of log lines in the specified time range
panels.title: Count over time

list.description: Accessible only when also scraping metrics from PrusaLink
list.label: Printer
list.name: printer

title: Prusa Syslog Dashboard
